sourcesContent:
import { Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Cart({ cartItems, SetcartItems }) { console.log(cartItems); function increaseqty(items){ if(items.qty === items.product.stock){ return ; } const updateitems = cartItems.map((i)=> i.product._id === items.product._id ? { ...i, qty: i.qty + 1 } : i ) SetcartItems(updateitems); } function decreaseqty(items){ if(items.qty === 1){ return ; } const updateitems = cartItems.map((i)=> i.product._id === items.product._id? { ...i, qty: i.qty - 1 } : i ) SetcartItems(updateitems); } return (

Your Cart: {cartItems.length}

{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.product.description}

${item.product.price}

decreaseqty(item)}>- increaseqty(item)}>+
))}

Order Summary

Subtotal: {cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=>(acc+item.qty),0)}(Units)

Est. total: ${cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=>(acc+item.product.price*item.qty),0)}

); }
